mapper.select: SELECT b.title, r.content, r.grade, r.write_date FROM board b JOIN reply r ON b.idx = r.board JOIN member m ON r.member = m.idx WHERE m.idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: merge into reply t using ( select #{member} as member, #{board} as board, #{content} as content, #{grade} as grade from dual ) s on (t.member = s.member and t.board = s.board) when matched then update set t.content = s.content, t.grade = s.grade, t.write_date = sysdate when not matched then insert (member, board, content, grade) values (s.member, s.board, s.content, s.grade)
mapper.select: select m.nickname, r.* from reply r join member m on m.idx = r.member where r.board = #{board} order by r.write_date
select board from reply where idx = #{idx}
